node.display_long_description:
[Summary]
Swords of Gargantua is a VR sword-action game you can experience in single-player mode or online co-op with up to 3 other players.

Adventure through the Tesseract Abyss floors to beat the giant Gargantua lying in its deepest layer, Floor 101. 

[Awards]
・Oculus Store / Hall of Fame

[Features]
・Sharpen your blade and abilities after every fight and take on thrilling battles along your journey. 
・A wide variety of melee weapons are available to help you achieve your own virtual reality sword art action: one and two-handed swords, katanas, axes, maces, boomerangs, shields, etc.
・Enchant your weapons and give them super powers. 
・Use voice chat to communicate while playing with your fellow warriors to take on the enemies in the Tesseract Abyss or join up to 8 players in a lounge for pre or post-game hangouts.
・Sense of immersion enhanced by realistic sound optimized for VR. 
・Enjoy endless content thanks to user-created weapons and battles Mods.
・The game supports cross-buy

nodes.title: New Content Coming Soon!
nodes.body_text:
SWORD of GARGANTUA will be celebrating its 2nd anniversary on June 7th, 
and we are having new weapons and events to celebrate this milestone.

We are also developing the next big update, 
so follow us on our socials to stay tuned!

6月7日で2周年をむかえる「ソード・オブ・ガルガンチュア」ですが、
2周年を記念した武器やイベントを開催する予定です。

また、次期大型アップデートも開発中です。
詳細は近日中に公式SNSにて発表致します。


Discord
Twitter US
Twitter JP

nodes.title: New Weapon Dark Sword and Vtuber Rei Tsugumine Birthday!
nodes.body_text:
Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Join Fight] Grudges Withdraw" to start the event. 
When your personal score reach one of the goals during the event period, you will obtain the "Dark Sword".

メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【共闘】怨敵退散」を選択。
イベントをプレイしたユーザー全員で獲得したポイントの合計が目標数に到達すると、イベント終了後に「ダークソード」を報酬として受け取ることができます。



Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Challenge] Rei Tsumugine Birthday Party!" to start the event. 
When the total number of Small-One enemies defeated during the event period reaches the target goal, you will obtain the "Rei Tsumugine Sword".

メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【挑戦】紡音れい誕生祭！」を選択。
イベントをプレイしたユーザーがSmall-Oneを倒した数の合計が目標数に到達すると、「紡音れいソード」を報酬として受け取ることができます。



Running from Thursday, 13th of May (01:00PDT) to Wednesday, 26th of May (08:00PDT)

Discord
Twitter US
Twitter JP

node.reviewDescription:
I bought this game a couple of weeks ago and have to say this is one of my favorite sword fighting games. Not only do they update this game quite often but they always bring new stuff to the game and that is much appreciated. However the comments I do have for this is more of one being a suggestion and the second being a problem that has some minor fixes that just need to be applied. The one thing I suggest is trading. I keep hearing people getting items that others need and they each wish they could trade with each other, this isn't a major problem but I would love to see it. Also one more thing is that in single player mode I see the same amount of enemies as multiplayer, if you could get it to where less spawn in the single adventure that would be fantastic as well. Now time for the bug. I believe it only occurs on Oculus Quest but I'm not for sure but there is a bug from time to time where you can't pick up a weapon or do anything, this I believe is a serious issue that needs to be fixed. While it isn't that bad in multiplayer, since it resets itself when you go to the next level, but when you do it in single player you can see why it can be a issue. However seeing past all of that, it is a really fun game and I do love it a lot, KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!

I am willing to give more details or suggestions if need be because this is an amazing game indeed. A must have.

developerResponse.body: Hi, we really appreciate your review and feedback! I agree that trading could be a useful feature, we will keep that in mind. Also, we are aware of the weapon bug and will do our best to fix it asap :)
